TopicTitle: Texture Replacer problems landed on Kerbin

Articles.Content: So, I installed TR, it looked awesome. I got used to the menu, then installed the BioSuit Mk1 texture, cuz that looked sweet. So, I took the .cfg file and put it into "TextureReplacer". I put it in there next to the @Default.cfg, and it turned out BAD. It didn't work. I went to my TR menu, and I couldn't find the skin. Please give me step by step instructions on how to put these in!
